name: The Ghosts of Terinor
description:
The Ghosts of Terinor have recently gained the ability to drain magical powers. As expected your ability to throw fireballs was confiscated by them almost immediately. It had previously been a live and let live situation between you and the ghosts but the time has now come to take care of them once and for all. The Use your fathers swords to dispatch the evil and diabolical Ghosts of Terinor and reclaim your Mojo!

Explore the Terinor landscape for the ghosts graveyards and destroy their ghostly grave headstones to free your powers from entrapment.

Use roll and block to attempt to reduce damage and then dispatch the enemy with dual enchanted blades.

You will free your magic!
